meanings.definition: Capable of being formed or shaped.
meanings.sent1: The clay was formable, allowing the artist to mold it into various shapes.
meanings.sent2: The playdough is formable, so you can create different figures with it.
meanings.sent3: The flexible material was so formable that it even took the shape of a heart when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a formable piece of clay, ready to be shaped by new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The putty was incredibly formable, making it easy to sculpt intricate designs.

meanings.definition: Able to take on a particular form or shape.
meanings.sent1: The material is formable, allowing it to be molded into specific designs.
meanings.sent2: The balloon is formable, so you can twist it into different animal shapes.
meanings.sent3: The cookie dough was so formable that they made it into tiny animal figures before baking.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were formable like clay, taking on new shapes with each idea.
meanings.sent5: The playdough is incredibly formable, making it perfect for creating detailed sculptures.
